text:
The Nabble service seems to migrate to a new infrastructure.
Current links in FOP documentation are referencing an empty site.

URL to old Nabble are:
http://old.nabble.com/FOP---Users-f353.html
http://old.nabble.com/FOP---Dev-f352.html

Note that old Nabble is currently up to date.

text: Nabble redirects now to correct sites.
